title: Unable to connect to match

replies.body:
It's really important that you stop queuing up for anymore matches for now, otherwise you'll rack up [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalties as well as cause others to be down a player.  

Even if your internet is fine, you can have problems reaching specific services like the game server.  The best way to get this fixed up is by going over every step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to clear up any blcoks and instability.

You can also use the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to auto-configure firewalls just in case.

Test these in custom games until you are absolutely certain you won't run into anymore issues.  I hope that helps!
